author: Reuters Staff
description: Canada's main stock index was muted on Thursday as gains in technology stocks were offset by energy and mining stocks, which fell due to weakness in commodity prices.

content:

author: Reuters Staff
description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau agreed on Friday to redouble their efforts to secure a trade agreement as soon as possible to unlock such a deal's "huge opportunities".
title: UK, Canada agreed to redouble efforts for trade deal - Reuters

author: Reuters Staff
description: Energy shares pushed Canada's main stock index to a record high on Tuesday, as investors eyed the U.S. Federal Reserve's meeting this week for cues on the tapering of its monetary policy.
title: CANADA STOCKS-TSX hits record high on energy boost - Reuters

author: Moira Warburton
description: Canada is set to begin a hotly anticipated auction of the mobile telecommunications bandwidth necessary for 5G rollout, one that was delayed more than a year by the pandemic.

description: Steven Spielberg's production company Amblin Partners has reached a multi-year deal to supply movies to Netflix Inc, the company said in a statement on Monday.
